questions.question: You are a student with an A2 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 60 words. Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it; who went; what happenedâ€¦?

answers.answer: Last summer, my family and I went to Greece for a two-week vacation. We visited the famous islands like Santorini, Mykonos, and Crete. On Mykonos, we rented a boat and went to a secluded beach. There, we had a barbecue, swam in the crystal-clear water, and enjoyed the stunning sunset. It was an unforgettable experience that brought us closer together as a family.
